Question: What does Corbyn negotiate with Perkins in exchange for the release of Moreno and Breeze?
Options:
A. A deal for the release of Will
B. Access to the vault for the money
C. A safe passage out of the storm
D. Additional mercenaries for the heist
Answer: Access to the vault for the money

Options:
A. It was stolen by Corbyn

Answer: It was sucked into the storm

Answer: It was sucked into the storm along with one of the trucks
